step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting with fists clenched and arms drawn in. Ensure you're inhaling and tightening your muscles here.
You're opening your fingers and extending your arms well. Remember to exhale and relax your muscles as you do this.
Keep up the good work with the outward arm movement and muscle relaxation. Ensure you are exhaling fully.
Your arm extension is looking good. Focus on maintaining a relaxed posture as you exhale.
Great job completing the repetitions! Remember to fully open your fingers and relax your muscles on the exhale.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the horizontal pumping exercise! Remember to inhale and tighten your fists, then exhale and open your fingers while extending your arms. Keep practicing this to help with lymph drainage.
